UNPLAYABLE due to basic setting omissions.

1st: Maximum mouse sensitivity needs to be DOUBLED in order for me to play. For whatever reason, the maximum is set far too low for me, so I'm constantly running into walls and am unable to aim with any efficacy. Do I choose to re-train my gaming reflexes, or do I skip the games with poor settings? Obviously I skip the games with poor settings.

2nd. Your own players scream volume is WAY TOO HIGH, causing penetrating ear damage and cannot be adjusted.

3rd. The time-attack for repair and wriggling free is exceptionally ableist. I can play FPS games just fine, but your "spam a button in maybe 0.15th of a second or fail" makes the game unplayable for me. It makes the game of "Only those with exceptional reflexes, low latency screens, and low latency keyboards, can play. Ridiculous. 

4th. LOOPERS make this game unplayable. The mechanics of turning speed mean that survivors turn faster than killers, ,meaning they can just run around the same object over and over and over indefinately, making playing the killer a pointless endeavor in extreme frustration.

Game is a hard, hard pass.

Chill game to play with a group of friends. The only negative I have to say about this game is the penalty time. It increases after each time: 5 mins, 1 hour, 5 hours. Of course people who leave early for no reason should be penalized, but for disconnecting?? This system needs to be fixed. 10-20 minutes should plenty. I have no idea why 5 hours? Do you want or not want people to play your game?

DO NOT GET THIS GAME IF YOU PLAN TO PLAY KILLER! the past year or so has seen survivor sided buffs over and over again with little for the killers. Killers are nerfed left and right while survivors are buffed. to top it off the match making in this game is horrid. either you get the hardest cut throat survivors or have fresh installs, that dont know the maps. because of these 1 sided games the amount of killers have dropped quite a bit resulting even wilder match making. DO NOT BUY THIS GAME FOR KILLERS!

As someone who's been playing this game for over 600hr's, been a rank 1 survivor player, allow me to tell you, let the player count continue to dip and this game die. The games balance is truly awful, especially for killers, playing killer more often then not will be totally unfun with survivors able to make you miserable the whole time, I would know I used to be one. The addition of SBMM has also killed the game in every form, I did over 10 matches of killer today alone, every match had at least 2 golds or iri survivors vs an Ash killer (Lowest possible rank). Then again expect nothing less from BHVR, they wouldn't know balance if it slapped them in the face. Thats not even counting the list of perks that just suck the fun out of the game over and over. 

tl;dr: Games awful, don't waste you money. It's a highly toxic community, with very poor balance and each side wanting to do all they can to make the other miserable.
